member.name: T:Abatab.Abatab
member.summary: The main Abatab project, and where the magic starts.

member.name: M:Abatab.Abatab.GetVersion
member.summary: Returns the current version of Abatab.
member.remarks: * This method is required by Avatar. * The version number is always the version that is in development. For example, while developing v1.0, this will return 1.0.

member.name: M:Abatab.Abatab.RunScript(NTST.ScriptLinkService.Objects.OptionObject2015,System.String)
member.summary: Executes script parameter request from Avatar, then returns a potentially modified OptionObject to Avatar.
member.param: The original OptionObject sent from Avatar.
The original Script Parameter request from Avatar.
member.remarks: * This method is required by Avatar. * This is the only time a PrimevalDebug log is written. * This method should remain fairly static, since most of the logic is taken care of by external projects.

member.name: T:Abatab.Roundhouse
member.summary: Determines what should be done with the Module component of the Script Parameter sent from Avatar.

member.name: M:Abatab.Roundhouse.ParseRequest(AbatabData.Session)
member.summary: Determines which Abatab Module should get the Command/Action/Option components of the Script Parameter sent from Avatar.
member.param: Settings and data for this session of Abatab.

member.name: T:Abatab.WebConfig
member.summary: Logic for working with the local Web.config file, which contains local settings for an Abatab session.

member.name: M:Abatab.WebConfig.Load
member.summary: Load the settings from the local Web.config file.
member.returns: A dictionary containing the settings from Web.config.
member.remarks: * Whenever a new value is added/removed to Properties/Settings.settings, it needs to be added/removed here as well. * Configuration settings details can be found here. * Settings are trimmed and converted to lowercase. [more info]
